name: Modbus-Radio
keywords: modbus, server, slave, radio, radiohead, lora, rf22, rf24, rf26, rf27, rf69, si4460, si4461, si4463, si4464, nrf24, nrf905, sx1276, sx77, sx78, rfm95, rfm96, rfm97, rfm98
description: A library that allows your Arduino to communicate via Modbus protocol, acting as a slave. Over-the-air implementation with devices supported by the RadioHead library.
